net.adamcin.oakpal.core

Interface Opear

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpearFile

    public interface Opear
    OPEAR stands for "OakPal Encapsulated ARchive".

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      URL getDefaultPlan()
      Get the default plan url specfied by the opear manifest, which may be OakpalPlan.EMPTY_PLAN_URL if no other plan is exported.
      ClassLoader getPlanClassLoader(@NotNull ClassLoader parent)
      Get a URL classloader constructed for this opear using the provided classloader as the parent.
      Result<URL> getSpecificPlan(@NotNull String planName)
      When the opear exports multiple plans, use this method to request a specific plan other than the default.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultPlan

        URL getDefaultPlan()
        Get the default plan url specfied by the opear manifest, which may be OakpalPlan.EMPTY_PLAN_URL if no other plan is exported.
        Returns:
        the default plan url

      • getSpecificPlan

        Result<URL> getSpecificPlan(@NotNull
                            @NotNull String planName)
        When the opear exports multiple plans, use this method to request a specific plan other than the default. Will return Result.failure(String) if the specified plan name is not found.
        Parameters:
        planName - the specified plan name (relative path within opear)
        Returns:
        a URL if successful, or an error if plan is not found

      • getPlanClassLoader

        ClassLoader getPlanClassLoader(@NotNull
                               @NotNull ClassLoader parent)
        Get a URL classloader constructed for this opear using the provided classloader as the parent.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent classloader
        Returns:
        a classloader with permission to load all classes and resources in the opear
